items.text: And the LORD spake unto Moses, saying,
items.plainText: And the LORD spake unto Moses, saying,

items.text: Speak unto the children of Israel, and take of every one of them a rod according to the house of their fathers, of all their princes according to the house of their fathers twelve rods: write thou every man's name upon his rod.
items.plainText: Speak unto the children of Israel, and take of every one of them a rod according to the house of their fathers, of all their princes according to the house of their fathers twelve rods: write thou every man's name upon his rod.

items.text: And thou shalt write Aaron's name upon the rod of Levi: for one rod shall be for the head of the house of their fathers.
items.plainText: And thou shalt write Aaron's name upon the rod of Levi: for one rod shall be for the head of the house of their fathers.

items.text: And thou shalt lay them up in the tabernacle of the congregation before the testimony, where I will meet with you.
items.plainText: And thou shalt lay them up in the tabernacle of the congregation before the testimony, where I will meet with you.

items.text: And it shall come to pass, that the man's rod, whom I shall choose, shall blossom: and I will make to cease from me the murmurings of the children of Israel, whereby they murmur against you.
items.plainText: And it shall come to pass, that the man's rod, whom I shall choose, shall blossom: and I will make to cease from me the murmurings of the children of Israel, whereby they murmur against you.

items.text: And Moses spake unto the children of Israel, and every one of their princes gave him a rod apiece, for each prince one, according to their fathers' houses, even twelve rods: and the rod of Aaron was among their rods.
items.plainText: And Moses spake unto the children of Israel, and every one of their princes gave him a rod apiece, for each prince one, according to their fathers' houses, even twelve rods: and the rod of Aaron was among their rods.

items.text: And Moses laid up the rods before the LORD in the tabernacle of witness.
items.plainText: And Moses laid up the rods before the LORD in the tabernacle of witness.

items.text: And it came to pass, that on the morrow Moses went into the tabernacle of witness; and, behold, the rod of Aaron for the house of Levi was budded, and brought forth buds, and bloomed blossoms, and yielded almonds.
items.plainText: And it came to pass, that on the morrow Moses went into the tabernacle of witness; and, behold, the rod of Aaron for the house of Levi was budded, and brought forth buds, and bloomed blossoms, and yielded almonds.

items.text: And Moses brought out all the rods from before the LORD unto all the children of Israel: and they looked, and took every man his rod.
items.plainText: And Moses brought out all the rods from before the LORD unto all the children of Israel: and they looked, and took every man his rod.

items.text: And the LORD said unto Moses, Bring Aaron's rod again before the testimony, to be kept for a token against the rebels; and thou shalt quite take away their murmurings from me, that they die not.
items.plainText: And the LORD said unto Moses, Bring Aaron's rod again before the testimony, to be kept for a token against the rebels; and thou shalt quite take away their murmurings from me, that they die not.

items.text: And Moses did so: as the LORD commanded him, so did he.
items.plainText: And Moses did so: as the LORD commanded him, so did he.

items.text: And the children of Israel spake unto Moses, saying, Behold, we die, we perish, we all perish.
items.plainText: And the children of Israel spake unto Moses, saying, Behold, we die, we perish, we all perish.

items.text: Whosoever cometh any thing near unto the tabernacle of the LORD shall die: shall we be consumed with dying?
items.plainText: Whosoever cometh any thing near unto the tabernacle of the LORD shall die: shall we be consumed with dying?
